courses.title: Extreme Tickling Techniques
courses.description: Tickle your funny bone with this course on extreme tickling techniques. Warning: Side effects may include uncontrollable laughter!

courses.title: Laughter Yoga
courses.description: Join us for a hilariously fun yoga experience that combines laughter and traditional yoga poses. Guaranteed to boost your mood!

courses.title: Dance Like No One's Watching
courses.description: Shake off your inhibitions and dance like no one's watching! This course is all about having fun on the dance floor, no judgment allowed.

courses.title: Sarcasm Appreciation Workshop
courses.description: Sharpen your wit and master the art of sarcasm with Sir Snarkalot. Warning: Participants may develop a keen sense of humor.

courses.title: Fruit Loop Immersion Experience
courses.description: Dive into a world of crunchiness! Immerse yourself in a bath filled with Fruit Loops and unlock the secrets of sensory delight. Warning: May cause extreme happiness and cravings for breakfast cereal.

courses.title: Extreme Pogo Stick Jumping
courses.description: Defy gravity and sanity with extreme pogo stick jumping. Safety gear provided, but bravery essential.

courses.title: Ninja Training Camp
courses.description: Master the art of invisibility, throwing stars, and stealthy moves in this intensive ninja training camp. Black attire not included.

courses.title: Haunted House Design
courses.description: Create spine-chilling haunted houses that will terrify and delight. Perfect for aspiring Halloween enthusiasts.

courses.title: Swing Choreography Masterclass
courses.description: Dance, flip, and spin gracefully on a swing. Channel your inner circus performer in this unique swing choreography class.

courses.title: Lego Face Sculpting
courses.description: Transform ordinary Lego bricks into expressive faces. Unleash your creativity in the world of plastic block portraiture.

courses.title: Fruit Loop Bath Design
courses.description: Create a colorful and crunchy bath experience by designing your own Fruit Loop bath. Bathrobe and sense of humor required.

courses.title: Moose Mouth Yoga
courses.description: Join this unique yoga class where participants mimic the majestic open-mouth posture of a moose. Antlers optional.

courses.title: Blue Orange Fruit Tasting
courses.description: Explore the mysterious world of blue oranges and other oddly colored fruits. Taste and discuss the peculiar flavors.
